additional.#text:
VAR product = PLAN.PRODUCTS
VAR zhuP = 0.0
VAR fuP = 0.0
VAR sum = 0.0
VAR Zpay = ''
VAR Fpay = ''
VAR num = 0.0
FOR (VAR i = 0.0; i < size(product); i++)
{
    VAR p = product[i]
    IF (p.MAIN == 'yes')
    {
        zhuP = zhuP + p.PREMIUM
        Zpay = p.PAY_CODE
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID <> 'HDT024' AND p.MAIN == 'no' AND p.QXFL == 'changqi')
    {
        num++
        Fpay = p.PAY_CODE
        IF (Zpay == Fpay OR Fpay == 'parent')
        {
            fuP = fuP + p.PREMIUM
        }
    }
    sum = zhuP + fuP
}
RETURN sum

VAR pvs = 
VAR RULE1 = 0.0
VAR [age]

VAR [total]

VAR [apa]
VAR [ppy]
VAR [pye]

VAR RULE4 = 0.0
VAR RULE5 = 0.0

VAR isFgsq = function dec

VAR product = PLAN.PRODUCTS
VAR [zhuxian1]
FOR (VAR i = 0.0; i < size(product); i++)
{
    VAR p = product[i]
    IF (p.DEF_ID == 'NPT002')
    {
        zhuxian1 = product[i]
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID == 'NPT001')
    {
        zhuxian1 = product[i]
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID == 'NPP007')
    {
        zhuxian1 = product[i]
    }
}
age = INSURANT.AGE
sex = INSURANT.GENDER_CODE
IF (zhuxian1.DEF_ID == 'NPT002')
{
    total = 80.0 - age
}
IF (zhuxian1.DEF_ID == 'NPP007')
{
    total = 100.0 - age
}
IF (zhuxian1.DEF_ID == 'NPT001')
{
    total = 16.0
}
year = zhuxian1.PAY_PERIOD
temp_premium = PREMIUM
temp_amount = AMOUNT
cumulativePremium = 
apy = 
aye = 
apa = 
ppy = 
pye = 
ppp = 
FOR (VAR i = 0.0; i < 5.0; i++)
{
    VAR p_add_year = try(add_year[i], 0.0)
    apy[i] = p_add_year
    VAR p_add_year_end = try(add_year_end[i], 0.0)
    aye[i] = p_add_year_end
    VAR p_add_prm = try(add_prm[i], 0.0)
    apa[i] = p_add_prm
    VAR d_saw_year1 = try(saw_year1[i], 0.0)
    ppy[i] = d_saw_year1
    VAR d_saw_year2 = try(saw_year2[i], 0.0)
    pye[i] = d_saw_year2
    VAR d_saw_v = try(saw_v[i], 0.0)
    ppp[i] = d_saw_v
}
premium = 
addPremium = 
partValue = 
sczlyValue = 
fhpartValue = 
cashValue = 
dieValue = 
rulebw()
RETURN pvs

        num++

        Zpay = p.PAY_CODE
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID <> 'HDT024' AND p.MAIN == 'no' AND p.QXFL == 'changqi')
    {
        num++
        Fpay = p.PAY_CODE
        IF (Zpay == Fpay OR Fpay == 'parent')
        {
            fuP = fuP + p.PREMIUM
        }
    }
    sum = zhuP + fuP
}
RETURN sum

additional.#text:
VAR product = PLAN.PRODUCTS
VAR zhuP = 0.0
VAR fuP = 0.0
VAR sum = 0.0
VAR Zpay = ''
VAR Fpay = ''
VAR num = 0.0
FOR (VAR i = 0.0; i < size(product); i++)
{
    VAR p = product[i]
    IF (p.MAIN == 'yes')
    {
        zhuP = zhuP + p.PREMIUM
        Zpay = p.PAY_CODE
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID <> 'HDT024' AND p.MAIN == 'no' AND p.QXFL == 'changqi')
    {
        num++
        Fpay = p.PAY_CODE
        IF (Zpay == Fpay OR Fpay == 'parent')
        {
            fuP = fuP + p.PREMIUM
        }
    }
    sum = zhuP + fuP
}
RETURN sum
